title: Liev Schrieber spoon-feeds girlfriend Taylor Neisen ice cream during romantic date in New York
text:
Love is sweet for Liev Schreiber and girlfriend Taylor Neisen.

The couple enjoyed a date to the SoHo ice cream parlor Morgensterns in NYC on Monday night.

There, the Ray Donovan actor, 52, was seen spoon-feeding dessert to his 27-year-old love.

What a treat! Liev Schreiber and girlfriend Taylor Niesen went on a sweet ice cream date on Sunday night

The couple smiled and held hands as they made their way inside the eatery.

Liev dressed in a casual jeans and hoodie combo for their night out.

Meanwhile, Taylor was understated in a teal jumpsuit underneath a dark jacket.

Spoon fed: The Ray Donovan actor, 52, was seen spoon-feeding dessert to his 27-year-old love during their night out

After snagging their scoops, the pair went outside.

There, Liev offered Taylor a taste of his flavor, so he leaned over to serve her a small scoop.

Things looked like they were going great for the couple, who have been linked since 2017.

Ex: Prior to dating Taylor, Liev was in a long term relationship with Naomi Watts, seen above October 3

Prior to dating Taylor, Liev was in a long term relationship with Naomi Watts, though the pair were never married through their 11-year union.

Schreiber and Watts were together until 2016, but still remain close friends, co-parenting sons Sam, 10, and Sasha, 12.

In August, she talked openly about the couples break-up to Harper's Bazaar: 'Liev and I always knew we had to put the kids first and that, no matter what, we would respect each other and take care of each other in the best way going forward for the benefit of our children.'

'We're easy with each other and we want the best for each other. Our friendship is better now than it ever was.'
description: The couple enjoyed a date to the SoHo ice cream parlor Morgensterns in NYC on Monday night. There, the Ray Donovan actor, 52, was seen spoon-feeding dessert to his love.
